text:
@GOPChairwoman @DHS_Wolf
 “Dangerous healthcare workplace conditions have become the norm” since Covid-19 spread widely in the US, said the National Nurses United union which conducted the survey.

More than 100 nurses have died since the beginning of the pandemic.
